backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling user profiles with access control plus a contact form system with admin-only retrieval and deletion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing packaging workflow and documentation features with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for all frontend source files describing their roles in the app.
frontend/EXPORT_ZIP.md: Documentation explaining prerequisites and steps to generate and use the project source ZIP.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
Exclude patterns for removing build outputs, caches, and other non-source files from the ZIP.
frontend/scripts/package-source.sh: Shell script that packages the full project source into a ZIP while applying exclusion rules.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all site routes and renders through SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Authorization wrapper that requires Internet Identity auth and admin role before rendering admin content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state and clearing query cache.
Simple component rendering the construction logo image with configurable sizing.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: A React contact form component with validation, error handling, and submission using a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/design/BrandToke: Defines brand constants such as name, contact info, hours, and compliance text.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation links, contact details, hours, and disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Provides a responsive site header with navigation, branding, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageSecti: Reusable layout wrapper for page sections with configurable classes and IDs.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Top-level layout combining header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Displays a project preview card with image, metadata, and click handling.
Shows a modal with full project details, image, and metadata.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines the Project interface and a list of sample project objects with details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity and invalidates queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: Hooks for fetching all contact submissions and retrieving the caller's user role.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Simple hook to update and restore the document title on mount and unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status tracking using Dfinity AuthClient.
Defines a React Query mutation that submits contact form data via an actor and refreshes related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app and wraps it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company history, mission, vision, and values content.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiriesP: Admin page that lists contact inquiries, supports selection, and handles loading and error states using admin hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CompliancePage.tsx: Displays compliance information including licenses, certifications, and a detailed compliance statement.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact details and embeds a contact form for user inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the home page with a hero section, government approval highlights, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Renders the projects listing with cards and a modal that opens when a project is selected.
frontend/src/pages/SafetyQualityPage.tsx: Displays safety and quality information using sections and cards with descriptive content and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of construction services with icons and descriptions plus an additional section detailing the company’s approach.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions such as colors, shadows, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing the project’s state, features, and requirements for producing a downloadable full-source ZIP.
